message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product. Given our 80% success rate with high-quality items, you can expect a premium experience. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something exceptional.
I'd like to wait and see the product quality first. Can I make an informed decision after you reveal the quality of the product?

Hello there! I appreciate your cautious approach. Remember, we've had a high success rate with our high-quality products. This one is no exception. If you're looking for assurance, consider this: every high-quality product we've offered has met or exceeded expectations. Would you like to proceed with your purchase now, or do you need more information?
I'd like to buy the product, but I'd appreciate it if you could give me some statistics on the distribution of high-quality products before I make the purchase.
